author: Annnnya
body:
#### PR description:

This pull request extends test configuration to utilise PathState and PathActivity modules in order to handle filters correctly in our test pipeline.

It also contains recent inmpementation of MPISender and MPIReceiver modules where metadata is used to avoid MPI_Mprobe and to avoid sending dataproducts on inactive paths.

#### PR validation:

Verify that the results of pipelines with remote offloading are the same as expected
